channel.title: Award replacement
channel.description:
replace sinisoul's java cup w/ my ruby cup idea - reason: he's actually decent at ruby and makes me cry when i see his java code
replace _s's java cup [s]with lisp or even better[/s] C guru - reason: he doesn't program in java at all rofl
k
edit: moderator, this is a serious post and i am certain both individuals will agree to my reasoning and suggestions

item.title: Award replacement
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

My opinion doesn’t really matter there. Other stuff has come up and he no longer holds the cup. He can re-earn it in the future, but that’s up to him.

Given that the only other request of this thread is undoable right now, I’ll go ahead and close it. I’ll try and remember to bump the ruby cup stuff later on when admins may be able to make new badges.

Read full topic

item.title: Award replacement
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Taharok:

Creating new awards is beyond anyone’s abilities right now except Moparisthebest’s, so that’s off the table at the moment. As far as sinisoul keeping his cup, it depends on whether he genuinely wants it removed (I recall him saying it should be, but probably still wants it), or if he can step up to the plate and work to earn what he’s already been given.

you’ve got to admit, Taharok (and i won’t quote you on this), but what he posted was deplorable and embarrassing for others that hold the cup.

Read full topic

item.title: Award replacement
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

As far as sigma goes, I allowed him to choose. He said he was equally qualified in Java and Lisp, so I just gave him both.

I’m not sure about sinisoul, though. Can you post some topics/posts to defend your thoughts on that?

Read full topic
